name: JavaScript Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, loops, functions, and DOM manipulation.

name: JavaScript Advanced
description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript topics such as asynchronous programming, closures, and ES6 features.

name: .NET Framework
description: Become proficient in .NET framework to develop enterprise-level applications.

name: React
description: Master React to build modern web applications with reusable components and state management.

name: Python
description: Learn Python programming from scratch, including syntax, data structures, and basic algorithms.

name: C Programming
description: Understand the C programming language, from basic syntax to memory management and pointers.

name: DBMS
description: Learn relational database management systems, including SQL and database design concepts.

name: Frontend Development
description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build beautiful websites and responsive UIs.

name: Backend Development
description: Learn server-side development with Node.js, Express, and databases for scalable apps.
